actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that an individual may deduct amounts paid for his higher education, or for the higher education of any of his dependents.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for the expenses paid for the higher education of the taxpayer, or a dependent, not exceeding $1,000 for each student.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that an individual may deduct amounts paid for his higher education, or for the higher education of any of his dependents.
